title: Charming Okinawa Stay with Authentic Culinary Experiences & Kokuba River Views
description:
Experience the heart, culture and cuisine of Okinawa at this stylish property in the bustling city of Naha. Overlooking the Kokuba River, each room features plush beds, a deep bathtub and inviting interiors, making it the perfect place to enjoy your stay in Okinawa. Savour an authentic Okinawan breakfast featuring beloved local dishes at the Bistro De La Mer, offering a taste of the island’s rich culinary traditions. 

Discover the charm and culture of Okinawa from your home away from home. Ideally located near Naha Airport, Tsubogawa Station and the lively Kokusaidori Street, this hotel is the perfect launchpad for adventure, whether you’re exploring solo or with loved ones. Take a trip visit the must-see Shurijō Castle and explore its serene grounds.
